title: Anitta: Made in Honório
overview: Anitta: Made in Honório shows, in an unprecedented way, the private life and career of the singer Anitta, icon of funk and pop in Brazil. The show closely follows the controversial and fascinating artist in her intimacy and during the preparation of important shows on different stages around the world. It also shows her on the road and in meetings with her staff, while accumulating two roles: as an artist and entrepreneur.
